snippet.title: Vampyr Official Gameplay Tour - E3 2017
snippet.description:
Developer Dontnod showcases the combat and story.

Catch up on Everything E3 2017 here!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uB9RP2SV8HY&list=PLraFbwCoisJBbdFblzX5WnoMktUk7KOCN&index=1

Check out our IGN Access coverage of E3 2017!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gA3CELrRlZQ&index=1&list=PLraFbwCoisJCMnL5mdxT_Ey22QuAhPEiI
